analysis.description:
ExrnSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#167-202) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- exrnAvailable == 0

ExrnSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#167-202) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,exrnBought) (/unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#194-196)

ExrnSale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#155-157)
HumanStandardToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#127-129)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/32/0x94bd84e41320f04964c78be4025b2e5699a0727c.sol#118:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
